main event: A blue and white ball-shaped object was observed, giving off a flash in Great Bend, Kansas.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 5-7 seconds.,The object was flying in a southeast direction.,The observation was made at 24 Mar 58 10:19 Zulu time.,The report suggests the object might be a meteor.,The source of the observation was a civilian.
sighted object: one ball-shaped blue and white object
